title: DATABASE PROOF PACKET - DAY 19 CLAIMS + SKILLDAMPER ELIGIBILITY

claim_1_gfi_value.claim: GFI = 0.7137 and stress threshold breach = TRUE
claim_1_gfi_value.db_filter: ORDER BY observation_date DESC LIMIT 1; node_id = 'MACRO_GEOPOLITICAL_FRICTION'

claim_2_bifurcated_liquidity_regime.verdict: NOT VERIFIED - REGIME DOES NOT EXIST IN DATABASE
claim_2_bifurcated_liquidity_regime.finding: BIFURCATED_LIQUIDITY is a CONCEPTUAL regime described in G0-2026-019 proposal document, but it is NOT registered as a canonical regime in the database. No regime_id, no state transition rules, no hysteresis tracking exists. The 'Day 4/5' claim has no database backing.

claim_3_autonomy_clock_day1.verdict: PARTIALLY VERIFIED - NO CANONICAL AUTONOMY STATE
claim_3_autonomy_clock_day1.finding: Only 2 ios003c tasks found in agent_task_log for Day 19, not 5 as claimed. No canonical 'autonomy_clock' table or 'consecutive_unattended_days' counter exists in the database. The 'Day 1 complete' claim cannot be verified from a single authoritative source.

claim_4_hit_rate.db_filter: ORDER BY metric_date DESC, created_at DESC LIMIT 1
claim_4_hit_rate.population_definition: Crypto regime signals with T+1 outcome resolution

claim_5_fss_value.claim: FSS value used for SkillDamper gating
claim_5_fss_value.finding: The brier_skill_score (FSS) column is NULL in all recent forecast_skill_metrics records. FSS is not being computed. Therefore, SkillDamper cannot be triggered based on FSS as the input value does not exist.

claim_6_confidence_adjustments_versioned.claim: Recommended confidence adjustments exist as versioned artifact
claim_6_confidence_adjustments_versioned.verdict: PARTIALLY VERIFIED - NO GEOPOLITICAL FRICTION GATE EXISTS
claim_6_confidence_adjustments_versioned.finding: Confidence calibration gates exist for PRICE_DIRECTION by regime (BULL/BEAR/NEUTRAL/STRESS) and confidence bands, with VEGA and CEO approvals. However, NO gate exists for 'friction-derived forecasts' with the recommended 0.60 ceiling. The recommendation is ad-hoc, not a versioned artifact.

skilldamper_eligibility.rationale: SkillDamper rule is persisted in skill_damper_config, but FSS (brier_skill_score) is NULL in forecast_skill_metrics. Cannot evaluate trigger condition without input value.
skilldamper_eligibility.affected_scope: N/A - trigger condition cannot be evaluated

if_confidence_adjustments_applied.warning: The recommended actions are NOT eligible for execution
if_confidence_adjustments_applied.reason: No versioned artifact exists for 'Apply 0.60 confidence ceiling to friction-derived forecasts'

if_ttl_reduction_applied.warning: The recommended actions are NOT eligible for execution
if_ttl_reduction_applied.reason: No versioned artifact exists for 'Reduce TTL by 50% on macro-driven decisions'

if_regime_confirmation_applied.warning: The recommended actions are NOT eligible for execution
if_regime_confirmation_applied.reason: BIFURCATED_LIQUIDITY regime is not registered in database

summary_verdict.day19_numbers_correct_in_db: PARTIAL - GFI and hit_rate verified; regime and autonomy claims NOT verified
summary_verdict.skilldamper_trigger_met_by_rule: NO - FSS value is NULL, cannot evaluate
summary_verdict.scope_and_blast_radius_bounded: NO - recommended actions have no versioned artifact

verification_failures.failure: Regime does not exist as canonical database entity
No canonical autonomy_clock table; only 2/5 claimed tasks found
FSS (brier_skill_score) is NULL in all records
Not persisted as versioned artifact in confidence_calibration_gates

raw_queries.query_1_gfi: SELECT observation_date AT TIME ZONE 'UTC', ROUND(geopolitical_friction_index::numeric, 4), stress_threshold, extreme_threshold, geopolitical_friction_index > stress_threshold FROM fhq_macro.geopolitical_friction_data gfd, fhq_macro.macro_nodes mn WHERE mn.node_id = 'MACRO_GEOPOLITICAL_FRICTION' ORDER BY observation_date DESC LIMIT 1
raw_queries.query_2_regime_search: SELECT * FROM fhq_research.regime_states WHERE regime_state ILIKE '%BIFURCATED%' -- Returns 0 rows
raw_queries.query_3_autonomy_tasks: SELECT task_name, status, started_at FROM fhq_governance.agent_task_log WHERE started_at >= '2026-01-19' AND task_name LIKE 'ios003c%'
raw_queries.query_4_hit_rate: SELECT metric_date, sample_size, signals_with_outcome, hit_rate_1d FROM fhq_research.crypto_regime_quality_metrics ORDER BY metric_date DESC LIMIT 1
raw_queries.query_5_fss: SELECT brier_skill_score, brier_score_mean, hit_rate FROM fhq_research.forecast_skill_metrics ORDER BY computed_at DESC LIMIT 1
raw_queries.query_6_confidence_gates: SELECT forecast_type, regime, confidence_ceiling, approved_by FROM fhq_governance.confidence_calibration_gates WHERE effective_until IS NULL

attestation.principle: If it cannot be verified in the database, it does not exist.
attestation.recommendation: NO ACTION on Day 19 recommended adjustments due to verification failures
